summary: Implements NetBIOS over TCP/UDP functionality, offering a client for the NetBIOS name service and classes to manage sessions, encode/decode packets, and perform operations such as name queries, registrations, refreshes, and node status checks.
business_intent: Enable applications and security tools to interact with Windows NetBIOS services for name resolution, registration, and session establishment, supporting network discovery, SMB communication, and penetrationâ€‘testing activities.
